column2: NOTE: Beginning in 2021, missing values for AMDEYR were replaced using statistical imputation. The imputation-revised variable used in

column1: <s>analysis, IRAMDEYR, appears in the Imputed Adult Depression section.</s>

column2: Len : 1    ADULT: PAST YEAR MAJOR DEPRESSIVE EPISODE (MDE)
OTE: The following four variables make up the four role domains (home management, work, close relationships with others, and social life) of

column1: <s>the Sheehan Disability Scale (SDS), which measures the impact of a disorder on an adult's life.</s>

column2: Len : 1    ADULT: DEPRESS FEELINGS ROLE IMPAIRMENT - HOME MANAGEMENT
Len : 1    ADULT: DEPRESS FEELINGS ROLE IMPAIRMENT - ABILITY TO WORK
Len : 1    ADULT: DEP FEELINGS ROLE IMPAIRMENT - CLOSE RELATIONSHIPS
Len : 1    ADULT: DEPRESSIVE FEELINGS ROLE IMPAIRMENT - SOCIAL LIFE
